task.title: Casting Magic
task.shortdesc: This is the way in which magic is cast in the game.

taskbody.context: Magic works the same way as any roll, but it does require a few extra steps. It will come down to a dice roll however.

step.cmd: Choose the spell that the player wishes to cast.
Determine the effect of the spell with the GM.
Determine how much the spell is going to cost to cast it, either in materials or in fatigue.
Determine the target of the spell, if applicable.
Determine how the target will resist the spell, if applicable.
Roll: The player rolls their Spell Power, and the opponent rolls their resistance in an opposed check.
Determine effect as a normal opposed roll. If the player wins, the spell affects the enemy, if the enemy wins, the spell does nothing.
